# MediaQuery store

## MediaQuery values

| Property | default | Description |
| :------- | :------ | :---------- |

## MediaQuery events

| Event name | Argument        | Description                               |
| :--------- | :-------------- | :---------------------------------------- |
| change   | MediaQueryState | Called when the media query state changes |
| mount    | Element         | Called when the component is mounted      |
| clean    | null            | Called when the component is removed      |

## MediaQuery state

```ts
export interface MediaQueryState {
        snapshot: [MediaQueryState]
        callback(): void
        change(): void
        mount(): void
        clean(): void
}
```
